channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiWAN
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiWAN

item.title: CVE-2021-24009|2024-08-03T19:14:10.030Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiwan
item.description: Multiple improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command vulnerabilities (CWE-78) in the Web GUI of FortiWAN before 4.5.9 may allow an authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying system's shell via specifically crafted HTTP requests.
